item.title: [PI]Help Asap
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Try that.

public boolean premiumItem(int itemId) { for (int i = 0; i < Config.PREMIUM_ITEMS.length; i++) { if (Config.PREMIUM_ITEMS[i] == itemId) return true; } return false; }

]if (premiumItem(wearID) && c.playerRights == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a Premium Member to wear this."); canWearItem = false; }

item.title: [PI]Help Asap
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

Source: Solitude

You must be Donator to wear EVERYTHING…

Where do i change this…?

The message i get is “You must be a donator to wear this item.”

And the code i found for it was:

if(c.isDonator == 0) for(int i : donItems) if(12742 == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }
Thats in ItemAssist.java / Its for Donator Cape
What do i do?

Read full topic
